==Adjustments & Optimizations==
* Updated [[Treasure Compass]] with [[Warrior's Challenge]], [[Mora Chest]]s, and [[Tribal Secret Space]]s.
* Added Batch Deletion of [[Map]] Pins with filter for [[Region]].
* Optimized descriptions of [[Talent]]s and [[Constellation]]s to be more simplified and intuitive along with links.
* Updated [[Adventurer Handbook]] Domain interface to be split by material, ordered by release, and display region name.
* Added [[Envisaged Echo]]es Reward Preview to Adventurer Handbook.
* Updated [[Crafting Bench]] Progression Calculator with crafting prompt, moved character filter from bottom to top, and added Character Quick Swap.
* Added real-time collection progress updates when collecting materials and required quantity reached reminder to [[Training Guide]] Level-Up Plan materials.
* Updated [[Imaginarium Theater]] with new Brilliant Blessings display structure, Stella Achievement Rewards, and Last Act Restart function.
* Added Lustrous Skins to [[Genius Invokation TCG]].
